Nashville-Davidson.Wildhorse Saloon:
This article is about the Nashville area restaurant; Wildhorse Saloon can also be confused with the Nevada brothel Wild Horse Ranch.
The Wildhorse Saloon is a country/western-themed restaurant, live music venue, and dance club located in downtown Nashville, Tennessee. It is managed by Marriott and owned by Ryman Hospitality Properties (formerly known as Gaylord Entertainment Company).
